title: Is the Nord Stream Pipeline Destruction the Next Cuban Missile Crisis? | Guests: Adam Curry & Kevin Freeman | 9/28/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Hurricane Ian as it threatens Florida and the media’s politicization of the storm to attack Florida Governor Ron DeSantis. Something is happening with the Nord Stream pipeline, and Glenn warns it could have life-changing consequences. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss cryptocurrency and its effects on banking. Adam Curry, the co-host of "No Agenda," joins to share everything you need to know about Bitcoin and what the federal government says about cryptocurrency. Ryan Gorman, host of "The Ryan Gorman Show" on WFLA in Tampa, joins to discuss Hurricane Ian and the catastrophic damage it could do to Florida. Glenn dives more into the Russia pipeline controversy and who’s responsible for the sabotage. BlazeTV host of "Economic War Room" Kevin Freeman joins to discuss whether the current downfall of America is due to incompetence or something intentional.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
